note:
Just another tech guy; been around since the Trash-80 & Apple II days. Capable (or used to...) speak COBOL, FORTRAN, & PL/I. Most elegant solutions are small & hand crafted, not a function-call....

Have become disillusioned with most of the software dev processes and industry.

Now focusing more on applied technologies (AC/DC, RF, mechanical systems, mini/micro controlled systems). Interests in General System thinking, systems ecology, and getting on with life beyond the keyboard (bored)....
